h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Turtle Tear Location
content: The Turtle Tear can be found in the North Shore of the Bitter Lake area in The New West. From the Shrine, stick to the right side of the coast and continue all the way along until you reach the large skeleton at the back.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Turtle_Tear.md', within the main section titled 'Turtle Tear', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Turtle Tear Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Turtle Tear can be found in the North Shore of the Bitter Lake area in The New West. From the Shrine, stick to the right side of the coast and continue all the way along until you reach the large skeleton at the back.
